HPI 8028 Nissan Skyline GT-R 1991 JTC Series 6th/5th Place K. Takahashi/K. Tsuchiya

Manufacturer page: http://www.hpimodelcar.com/line_up/index_8028.php

Kenji Takahashi, Keiichi Tsuchiya, & Australian ATCC/V8 Supercar driver Mark Skaife drove for Team Taisan in the 1991 JTC series (Skaife only for round 6 - Fuji InterTEC). Their best result was 2nd place in rounds 2 (Suzuka) & 3 (Tsukuba). Considering Skaife's name is not on the model I think it's safe to assume this does not represent the InterTEC car.

Takahashi & Tsuchiya finished the season in 6th & 5th places respectively while Skaife finished in 40th.
